title: One Word from God Can Change Your Life: Four Best Selling Works Complete in One Volume
description: The power of a word spoken is undeniable. The power of a Word from God is life changing. Kenneth and Gloria Copland have compiled One Word From God Can Change Your Life as one valuable resource from the nation's leading ministers. Sure to empower the reader, their view of circumstances -- no matter the situation -- will be from God's perspective.
author: Kenneth Copeland
